TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: I'm not sure whether or not to be insulted by that...
Decide whether to be insulted based on your perception of my personality, since I don't know what I meant...

@ trekkette

I'm sure it depends whether or not you enjoy sadistically torturing people for trivial reasons.

Cause after a while you get back to normal (mostly anyway).

I did a few allnighters too. My record was 36 hours straight.

Course I wasn't entirely sane to begin with.
To be fair, how many of us are sane here?

Cause after a while you get back to normal (mostly anyway).

I did a few allnighters too. My record was 36 hours straight.

Course I wasn't entirely sane to begin with.

What the..? that's exactly the same as my record. Weird.

@LeonG17: None of us probably. well, except maybe trekkette and Odin. But the rest of us are horribly disturbed.

Edit: glanced at the clock. About an hour left until 24 hours. woot. Thank you Dr.Pepper and your caffeine.

Edited June 2, 2013 by Rage097

To be fair, how many of us are sane here?

Sanity is relative, and changeable depending on the situation.

What the..? that's exactly the same as my record. Weird.

@LeonG17: None of us probably. well, except maybe trekkette and Odin. But the rest of us are horribly disturbed.

Trekkette admitted to having homicidal/suicidal thoughts unless she ate dark chocolate so only Odin is sane here then.

Edit: You would need some norm or base to base the sanity of someone on, you need a standardised level of saneness to measure sanity.

Does thinking your the last sane man on the planet make you crazy? Cause if it does, maybe I am.

~Will Smith.

And no. I spent my time on the funny farm, I'm not 100% sane either.

Ultimate rejection too, getting sent home from the funny farm for not being crazy enough.

Edited June 2, 2013 by OdinYggd
Ok then, no one here is sane anymore.

Trekkette admitted to having homicidal/suicidal thoughts unless she ate dark chocolate so only Odin is sane here then.

Edit: You would need some norm or base to base the sanity of someone on, you need a standardised level of saneness to measure sanity.

So who would be the least sane? I think that it's among Me, Chobit, Kalawang, and whenever Musicpenguin shows up, him.

EDIT: wait! Jedimaster is the only REAL sane one.
Are you saying that I'm not insane? *eye twitch*
Chobit's the least sane. Trust me on that point.

Chobit's the least sane. Trust me on that point.

If you saw that creepypasta I wrote you'd change your tune pretty damn quick.

three words.

Detailed. Body. Horror.

Chobit's the least sane. Trust me on that point.

We could use some examples to back up that point.

We could use some examples to back up that point.

Chobit's probably gonna read this thread at some point. So, no, I'm not giving you any examples.

Chobit's probably gonna read this thread at some point. So, no, I'm not giving you any examples.

That is an example in itself, so Chobit will read it. Why not go all the way?
...I guess no ones fond of the idea of me sharing that creepypasta. good, I honestly wasn't looking forward to it. *visibly pales*

That is an example in itself, so Chobit will read it. Why not go all the way?

Because I've got a flyswatter, and if I start seeing really bad creepypasta in here I'll definately use it.

By really bad, I mean I looked up anatomy diagrams to name all the different organs and bones for it...God...

Let's just say it was about a room where all the walls began to close in on you. With excruciating detail on what it did to you.

Because I've got a flyswatter, and if I start seeing really bad creepypasta in here I'll definately use it.

Then only some mild examples then?

Does a flyswatter work on humans?

Edit: Rage, seriously, go to sleep and come back here when you feel better.
I'm thinking it was a bad idea to say anything at all... I'm currently very angry with Chobit and it's kind of colouring all our interactions.

Then only some mild examples then?

Does a flyswatter work on humans?

Edit: Rage, seriously, go to sleep and come back here when you feel better.

Dude. I'm fine. Dr. Pepper is my savior. I feel like I never stayed up. And you DO NOT WANT examples. Trust me.

@trekkette: Oh, really? What happened? Unless you don't want to share it of course. We won't...Well, I won't force it out of you.

@LEON VthatwayV You don't have enough examples?

Edited June 2, 2013 by Rage097
I meant mild examples of how Chobit is insane. Nothing else.
Does anyone have an issue with their auto-check being absolutely convinced the by "Kerbals" we mean "kernels"?
